name: Caught in a Loop, Program the Robot to Help
name_original: Caught in a Loop, Program the Robot to Help
description:
Submitted for the Wowie Jam 2022

Please note: I've programmed the majority of this game by scratch. Not everything works in this game yet, there are still quite a few features missing but there is a bit of a core experience here.  I ran out of time, and some collision properties were hard to get right.  But I do have a product that functions, and if you want to rate me low on that, then go right ahead!! I'll provide some updates to the game later!!

How to play:

You can use the gamepad, or the A/left and D/right keys to scroll through some of the options and select your code.  To select, press E/left alt or the primary action button on the gamepad.  The robot will update its position as you chose the code!

I haven't tested this yet, but this game should work on all types of hardware, the lowest I got was an AMD A4 with HD Radeon graphics at 6 gigs.  It does run using Wine with Linux.  Actual Linux build soon to follow!!
